name: Optimize Anaerobic Digestion Process
description: Optimize anaerobic digestion process conditions to maximize VFA production or methane yield
run: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni /tmp/biomni && pip install -q -e /tmp/biomni && python /mnt/code/optimize_anaerobic_digestion_process.py

fields.name: waste_characteristics
fields.description: Dictionary containing waste characteristics (total_solids, volatile_solids, cod)

fields.name: operational_parameters
fields.description: Dictionary containing operational parameters and their ranges (hrt, olr, if_ratio, temperature, ph)

fields.name: optimization_method
fields.description: Method used for optimization (rsm or genetic)
